price: Et la pesée, ce jour-là, sera équitable. Donc, celui dont les bonnes actions pèseront lourd...Voilà ceux qui réussiront !
arabic: وَٱلۡوَزۡنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wal-waznu yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
